ContentClassification.TableDescription: Observed Gehel Bevolking Mannen (GBM) 1989-93. Minimum Age: 50 Maximum Age: 89
ContentClassification.Comments: Study Data: Observed mortality for the period 1989-93. Primarily for use in comparison to GBM 1980-1985, GBV 1980-1985, GBM 1985-1990 and GBV 1985-1990 (See SOA Table Identities 647-648 and 966-967) Methodology: Not available at this time. Data Transcription Errors: None. Data Certified: 10/2013
